#labels Phase-Design
= Standard Field Names =

This is a proposal under review.

  * slug
  * title (char)
  * description (text)
  * body (text)
  * creator | author 
  * format (rst, markdown, textile, etc)
  * tags
  * language
  * license (GPL, BSD, MIT)
  * created (date created)
  * modified (date modified)
  * sources (accredited sources)
